id="iG_social_c" class="ig-share-button aux-nav-button"><span class="icn-share"></span></button><div class="aux-nav-box social-media-box" id="iG_social"><strong>O <em>iG </em>nas redes </strong><a href="https://www.facebook.com/ig" target="_blank" title="Siga no Facebook"><span class="icn-facebook"></span> </a><a href="https://twitter.com/iG" target="_blank" title="Siga no Twitter"><span class="icn-twitter"></span> </a><a href="https://www.snapchat.com/add/portalig" target="_blank" title="Siga no Snapchat"><span class="icn-snap"></span> </a><a href="https://www.instagram.com/portal_ig/" target="_blank" title="Siga no Instagram"><span class="icn-instagram"></span></a></div></li><li><a href="//www.ig.com.br/?action=login" class="icn-mail"></a></li></ul></div></div></header><script type="text/javascript">/*! barra 2017-03-27 05:03 */function setActive(a){document.getElementById("main-menu-wrapper").removeAttribute("class");var b=document.getElementById(a);"iG_social"==a||document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),"active"==b.parentElement.getAttribute("class")?b.parentElement.setAttribute("class",""):b.parentElement.setAttribute("class","active")}function toogle(a,b){if(document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),null!=a&&null!=b){var c=document.getElementById(a),d=c.getAttribute("class");null==d?c.setAttribute("class",b):d.replace(/[\n\t]/g," ").indexOf(b)==-1?c.setAttribute("class",c.getAttribute("class")+" "+b):(y=d.split(b),""==y[0]?c.removeAttribute("class"):c.setAttribute("class",y[0]))}"jornais"==a?toogle("iG_jornais","opened"):"subcomportamento"==a&&toogle("iG_subcomportamento","opened"),"entretenimento"==a?toogle("iG_entretenimento","opened"):"servicos"==a&&toogle("iG_servicos","opened"),"ultimosegundo"==a?toogle("iG_ultimosegundo","opened"):"igtvig"==a&&toogle("iG_tvig","opened")}document.getElementById("iG_social_c").onclick=function(){setActive("iG_social")},document.getElementById("iG_mobile_menu_c").onclick=function(){toogle("main-menu-wrapper","opened")},document.getElementById("iG_comportamento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("subcomportamento","active")},document.getElementById("iG_jornais_c").onclick=function(){toogle("jornais","active")},document.getElementById("iG_servicos_c").onclick=function(){toogle("servicos","active")},document.getElementById("iG_ultimosegundo_c").onclick=function(){toogle("ultimosegundo","active")},document.getElementById("iG_tvig_c").onclick=function(){toogle("tvig","active")},document.getElementById("iG_entretenimento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("entretenimento","active")};</script>

</div>

      height: 16px;
    }

    .header-navegacao .header-title {
      padding: 0 26px;
    }

    @media (max-width: 767px) {
      .has-not-regua .header-navegacao .header-title {
        padding: 0 24px 0 68px; 
      }
    }

    #catalogo-pagina .header-navegacao.header-g1 .header-title .header-editoria--link:not(.header-editoria-multiline) {
      display: inline-block;
      padding: 15px 0;
    }

    #catalogo-pagina .header-navegacao.header-g1 .floating-bar .header-title .header-title-content {
      padding: 3px 13px;
    }

    #catalogo-pagina .header-navegacao.header-g1 .floating-bar .header-title .header-editoria--link {
      padding: 4px 0;
    }

    @media (min-width: 768px) {
      .header-navegacao .logo {
        width: 32px;
        height: 19px;
      }

      .header-navegacao .header-title {
        padding: 0 74px;  
      }

      #catalogo-pagina .header-navegacao.header-g1 .floating-bar .header-title .header-editoria--link.ellip-line {
        font-size: 28px;
      }

    }

    @media (min-width: 1065px) {
      .header-navegacao .header-title {
        padding: 0 145px;  
      }
    }
  </style><script>(function(){!function(){var n,e,t,o,r,l,i;i=function(){return/MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/},r=function(){return     <h1 itemprop="name">Metallica toca &quot;Hardwired&quot; no Lollapalooza 2017</h1>

    <div class="video-info">

      <p>
        <span class="data">25/03/2017</span>

          <span class="duracao-video">03:48</span>
      </p>
      <p class='descricao' itemprop="description">Lollapalooza aposta no rock pesado com Metallica no 1º dia. O o line-up do festival ainda tem pop dançante cantado por mulher (Tegan and Sara, Tove Lo) e rock da nova (Cage the Elephant e The 1975) e velha geração (Rancid).</p>
    </div>

  <li  title="Lollapalooza reúne mais de 40 atrações e 190 mil pessoas em SP" data-video-title="Lollapalooza reúne mais de 40 atrações e 190 mil pessoas em SP" data-video-id="5754737" data-video-data-exibicao="27/03/2017">
  <div class="video-trilho">
  <a href="/musica/lollapalooza/2017/videos/t/lollapalooza-2017/v/lollapalooza-reune-mais-de-40-atracoes-e-190-mil-pessoas-em-sp/5754737/" class="borda-interna">

    <span class="duracao">02:53</span>
</a></div>

    Fãs de todas as idades foram ao delírio com as apresentações dos seus ídolos em dois dias de festival.

    <a href="/musica/lollapalooza/2017/videos/t/lollapalooza-2017/v/lollapalooza-reune-mais-de-40-atracoes-e-190-mil-pessoas-em-sp/5754737/">Lollapalooza reúne mais de 40 atrações e 190 mil pessoas em SP</a>

      <input type="submit" class="botoes-sprite buscar" value="ok" />
    </fieldset>
  </form>
</div>

          </div>
          <div class="paginacao_trilho">

                    Nordeste

            var jqueryTimeout;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-15cca9e7-0a71-4ae6-a55a-bdcb2cc5bdd0');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();

                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 27/03/2017 14:00:25 --></html>

class="menu-item drop-menu jornais" id="jornais"><a id="iG_jornais_c" class="jornal drop-trigger">Jornais <span class="icn-arrow-down"></span></a><ul class="drop-itens" id="iG_jornais"><li class="subMenuJornais jorLinks">iG Bahia</a></li></ul></li></ul></nav><a href="#" class="mobile-menu" id="iG_mobile_menu_c">menu</a><ul class="aux-nav"><li><button type="button" title="Compartilhe" id="iG_social_c" class="ig-share-button aux-nav-button"><span class="icn-share"></span></button><div class="aux-nav-box social-media-box" id="iG_social"><strong>O <em>iG </em>nas redes </strong><a href="https://www.facebook.com/ig" target="_blank" title="Siga no Facebook"><span class="icn-facebook"></span> </a><a href="https://twitter.com/iG" target="_blank" title="Siga no Twitter"><span class="icn-twitter"></span> </a><a href="https://www.snapchat.com/add/portalig" target="_blank" title="Siga no Snapchat"><span class="icn-snap"></span> </a><a class="icn-mail"></a></li></ul></div></div></header><script type="text/javascript">/*! barra 2017-03-27 05:03 */function setActive(a){document.getElementById("main-menu-wrapper").removeAttribute("class");var b=document.getElementById(a);"iG_social"==a||document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),"active"==b.parentElement.getAttribute("class")?b.parentElement.setAttribute("class",""):b.parentElement.setAttribute("class","active")}function toogle(a,b){if(document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),null!=a&&null!=b){var c=document.getElementById(a),d=c.getAttribute("class");null==d?c.setAttribute("class",b):d.replace(/[\n\t]/g," ").indexOf(b)==-1?c.setAttribute("class",c.getAttribute("class")+" "+b):(y=d.split(b),""==y[0]?c.removeAttribute("class"):c.setAttribute("class",y[0]))}"jornais"==a?toogle("iG_jornais","opened"):"subcomportamento"==a&&toogle("iG_subcomportamento","opened"),"entretenimento"==a?toogle("iG_entretenimento","opened"):"servicos"==a&&toogle("iG_servicos","opened"),"ultimosegundo"==a?toogle("iG_ultimosegundo","opened"):"igtvig"==a&&toogle("iG_tvig","opened")}document.getElementById("iG_social_c").onclick=function(){setActive("iG_social")},document.getElementById("iG_mobile_menu_c").onclick=function(){toogle("main-menu-wrapper","opened")},document.getElementById("iG_comportamento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("subcomportamento","active")},document.getElementById("iG_jornais_c").onclick=function(){toogle("jornais","active")},document.getElementById("iG_servicos_c").onclick=function(){toogle("servicos","active")},document.getElementById("iG_ultimosegundo_c").onclick=function(){toogle("ultimosegundo","active")},document.getElementById("iG_tvig_c").onclick=function(){toogle("tvig","active")},document.getElementById("iG_entretenimento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("entretenimento","active")};</script>
